build.buildCommand: npm config set cache /tmp/.npm && npm config set fund false && npm config set audit false && find . -name 'package-lock.json' -delete 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && npm install --force && cd apps/marketing && npm install --force && npm run prebuild && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: cd apps/marketing && npm run preview -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT --allowed-hosts all
